commands.fastback.help.enable: Enable local backups backups on this world.
commands.fastback.help.file-remote: Create a remote backup target on the file system.
commands.fastback.help.gc: Run garbage collection to free up disk space.
commands.fastback.help.info: Info about current backup state and settings.
commands.fastback.help.list: List backup snapshots for this world.
commands.fastback.help.remote: Set the url for remote backups.
commands.fastback.help.shutdown: Enable or disable backups on shutdown.
commands.fastback.help.subcommands:
Available subcommands:
%s
For detailed help on a subcommand, run
/backup help [subcommand]
or go to https://pcal43.github.io/fastback
commands.fastback.help.uuid: Show the uuid for this world backup.
fastback.notify.enable-done: Enabled automatic local backups on world shutdown.
fastback.notify.file-remote-created:
Git repository created at %s
Remote backups enabled to:
%s
fastback.notify.info-remote-url-missing: Remote URL: Not Configured.  Run /backup remote [url]
fastback.notify.internal-error: An unexpected backup error occurred. See log for details.
fastback.notify.not-enabled: Backups are not enabled on this world.  Run '/backup enable'
fastback.notify.prune-no-default: No default pruning policy configured.  Please run /backup set-retention-policy
fastback.notify.prune-suggest-gc: Run /backup gc to reclaim disk space.
fastback.notify.push-failed: Local backup succeeded but remote backup failed.  See log for details.
fastback.notify.push-uuid-mismatch:
Remote at %s is a backup target for a different world.
Please configure a new remote for backing up this world.
fastback.notify.remote-how-to-enable:
Run '/backup remote enable' to enable remote backups to:
%s
fastback.notify.remote-how-to-enable-no-: Run '/backup remote <remote-url>' to enable remote backups.
fastback.notify.remote-no-url:
No remote URL is set.
Run '/backup remote <remote-url>'
fastback.notify.retention-policy-not-set: No retention policy set.  Run /backup set-retention
fastback.notify.shutdown-currently-disab: Backup on shutdown is currently disabled.
fastback.notify.shutdown-currently-enabl: Backup on world shutdown is currently enabled.
fastback.notify.shutdown-disabled: Backup on shutdown is now disabled.
fastback.notify.shutdown-enabled: Backup on world shutdown is now enabled.
fastback.notify.suggest-enable: Backups are disabled. To enable, run '/backup enable'
fastback.retain.count.description: Count: Keep only the %s most-recent snapshots.
fastback.retain.daily.description: Daily: Keep the last snapshot from each day, plus all snapshots from the last %s days
